languages.text: {n}{petname} склоняет голову. На этот раз его голос — не оглушительный грай, а тихий скрежет, словно ворон боится, что его услышат не те уши.{/n} "Древний. Смерть галактики".

{n}The raven bows its head. This time, the voice you hear is not the usual deafening croak, but a quiet rattle, as if {petname} were afraid of being heard by the wrong ears:{/n} "Ancient one. Death of the galaxy."
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} склоняет голову. На этот раз его голос — не оглушительный грай, а тихий скрежет, словно ворон боится, что его услышат не те уши.{/n} "Древний. Смерть галактики".

traits.locale_text: {n}The raven bows its head. This time its voice is not the usual deafening croak, but a quiet rattle, as if the raven is afraid of being heard by the wrong ears:{/n} "Ancient one. Death of the galaxy."

{n}The raven bows its head. This time its voice is not the usual deafening croak, but a quiet rattle, as if the raven is afraid of being heard by the wrong ears:{/n} "Ancient one. Death of the galaxy."

{n}The raven bows its head. This time, the voice you hear is not the usual deafening croak, but a quiet rattle, as if {petname} were afraid of being heard by the wrong ears:{/n} "Ancient one. Death of the galaxy."

languages.text: {n}レイヴンは頭を垂れた。今回耳にした声は、いつもの耳をつんざくような鳴き声ではなく、かすれた声だった。まるで{petname}が、誰かに聞かれるのを恐れているかのように。{/n}「古き者。銀河の死」
languages.original_text: {n}The raven bows its head. This time, the voice you hear is not the usual deafening croak, but a quiet rattle, as if {petname} were afraid of being heard by the wrong ears:{/n} "Ancient one. Death of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: {n}レイヴンは頭を垂れた。今回耳にした声は、いつもの耳をつんざくような鳴き声ではなく、かすれた声だった。まるで{petname}が、誰かに聞かれるのを恐れているかのように。{/n}「古き者。銀河の死」

languages.text: {n}Der Rabe senkt den Kopf. Diesmal hörst du nicht sein übliches ohrenbetäubendes Krächzen, sondern ein leises Röcheln, als hätte {petname} Angst, von den falschen Ohren gehört zu werden:{/n} "Alter. Tod der Galaxie."
languages.original_text: {n}The raven bows its head. This time, the voice you hear is not the usual deafening croak, but a quiet rattle, as if {petname} were afraid of being heard by the wrong ears:{/n} "Ancient one. Death of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rabe senkt den Kopf. Diesmal hörst du nicht sein übliches ohrenbetäubendes Krächzen, sondern ein leises Röcheln, als hätte {petname} Angst, von den falschen Ohren gehört zu werden:{/n} "Alter. Tod der Galaxie."

languages.text: {n}La corneille incline la tête. Cette fois-ci, {petname} ne laisse pas échapper un croassement assourdissant, mais un léger grincement, visiblement destiné à ne pas être entendu par des oreilles indiscrètes :{/n} « L'Ancien. Mort de la galaxie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The raven bows its head. This time, the voice you hear is not the usual deafening croak, but a quiet rattle, as if {petname} were afraid of being heard by the wrong ears:{/n} "Ancient one. Death of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: {n}La corneille incline la tête. Cette fois-ci, {petname} ne laisse pas échapper un croassement assourdissant, mais un léger grincement, visiblement destiné à ne pas être entendu par des oreilles indiscrètes :{/n} « L'Ancien. Mort de la galaxie. »

languages.text: {n}El cuervo inclina la cabeza. Esta vez, la voz que oyes no es su habitual graznido ensordecedor, sino un discreto gorjeo, como si {petname} tuviese miedo de que alguien estuviese escuchando:{/n} «Antiguo. Muerte de la galaxia».
languages.original_text: {n}The raven bows its head. This time, the voice you hear is not the usual deafening croak, but a quiet rattle, as if {petname} were afraid of being heard by the wrong ears:{/n} "Ancient one. Death of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuervo inclina la cabeza. Esta vez, la voz que oyes no es su habitual graznido ensordecedor, sino un discreto gorjeo, como si {petname} tuviese miedo de que alguien estuviese escuchando:{/n} «Antiguo. Muerte de la galaxia».

languages.text: {n}渡鸦低下了头。这一次，你听到的并不是它通常刺耳的嘎嘎声，而是安静的咯咯声，它似乎在担心你可能会听错它的话。{/n}“远古之物。星系的死亡。”
languages.original_text: {n}The raven bows its head. This time, the voice you hear is not the usual deafening croak, but a quiet rattle, as if {petname} were afraid of being heard by the wrong ears:{/n} "Ancient one. Death of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: {n}渡鸦低下了头。这一次，你听到的并不是它通常刺耳的嘎嘎声，而是安静的咯咯声，它似乎在担心你可能会听错它的话。{/n}“远古之物。星系的死亡。”

languages.text: {n}Kuzgun başını eğiyor. Bu kez duyduğun ses; kulakları sağır eden o her zamanki gaklama değil, sessiz bir ciyaklamaya benziyor. {petname}, yerin kulağı varmışcasına konuşuyor.{/n} "Kadim olan... Galaksinin sonu geliyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The raven bows its head. This time, the voice you hear is not the usual deafening croak, but a quiet rattle, as if {petname} were afraid of being heard by the wrong ears:{/n} "Ancient one. Death of the galaxy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kuzgun başını eğiyor. Bu kez duyduğun ses, kulakları sağır eden o her zamanki gaklama değil. Aksine sessiz bir ciyaklama gibi. {petname} yerin kulağı varmışcasına konuşuyor:{/n} "Kadim olan... Galaksinin sonu geliyor."
